public class HelloWorld {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        System.out.println("Hello, World");
    }
}

using System;
namespace HelloWorld
{
    class Hello
    {
        static void Main()
        {
            Console.WriteLine("Hello World!");
            Console.WriteLine("Press any key to exit.");
            Console.ReadKey();
        }
    }
}
